attributes.action: to ask Mayor Ken to spend £100 million on a Reptile Building in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are petitioning Mayor Ken (who does actually keep/has kept salamanders and once used to attend Reptile fairs)to use £100million of the tax payers money to create the worlds largest Reptile Collection in London, so that all the visitors to the Olympic games can see it as they fly over.

rejection.details: This petition system is to petition the Prime Minister. You must use another system if you want to petition the Mayor of London directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
